title: Please Identify
content:
Here I am again.

Please identify the font used in this logo:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708214624im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/logo_4915.jpg)

It’s not quite Impact as I initially thought.

Thanks.

 [‹ Font used on the poster of "Before The Devil Knows You're Dead"](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708214624/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45326 "Go to previous forum topic") [PLEASE ID New York Time T Magazine ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708214624/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45415 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mikemanuel

comments.content:
I reckon it has to be ’Haettenschweiler’.

[http://www.ascenderfonts.com/font/haettenschweiler.aspx?site=www.identif...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708214624/http:/www.ascenderfonts.com/font/haettenschweiler.aspx?site=www.identifont.com "http://www.ascenderfonts.com/font/haettenschweiler.aspx?site=www.identifont.com")

JH
Thank you so much. I didn’t realize it was just there staring at me. I stand corrected - it’s part of my font collection.
